body: Hi, I'm Zac. I have the record for most false punishments on one account. I am also a former and TeamSpeak Dev. I had my retired rank removed for overall immaturity despite not having broken any rules. Finally I am banned on TeamSpeak for Excessive bullying for saying "I think ALM's grandmother is going to come by TeamSpeak" in the nightclub channel. Go AMA.
body_tagged: Hi, I'm Zac. I have the record for most false punishments on one account. I am also a former and TeamSpeak Dev. I had my retired rank removed for overall immaturity despite not having broken any rules. Finally I am banned on TeamSpeak for Excessive bullying for saying "I think ALM's grandmother is going to come by TeamSpeak" in the nightclub channel. Go AMA.
